TFPT consistency uniqueness: CFE root

mp.dps = 80

Baseline (fixed varphi0):
- varphi0 = 0.053171952176845527309292471969749667875127759799791139640450979685319457237554636
- alpha = 0.007297325816919221299501641291875093776793725969421217729304923024143522608358825
- alpha^-1 = 137.03650146488582236606674817671213126705763898504867906796008564574330158473974

Uniqueness certificate for baseline cubic:
- C = 8 b1 c3^6 ln(1/varphi0) = 0.00000038188094235997593211152485511003738390144353783532087949447015936749727191983868
- alpha* = 4 c3^3 / 3 = 0.000083988370919790336417765762209801272377769104550724158162973234936416827589832004
- f(alpha*) = -0.00000038188123858891078605993509590626832958705466104459340498680715982373387433133946  (must be < 0 for exactly one positive root)

Self-consistent backreaction closure (fixed-point iteration):
- varphi_tree = 0.053051647697298445256294587790838120678153215246818816249222448019632265878075512
- delta_top   = 0.00012030447954708205299788417891154719697454455297232339122853166568719135947912407
- varphi0(alpha) = varphi_tree + delta_top * exp(-2 alpha)
- converged = True
- alpha = 0.0072973528346042204765918159048752981407210529175680975940816376031917842785831935
- alpha^-1 = 137.03599410158383008148619622913336009409257904171246722475352841304700901323215
- varphi0_used = 0.053170209119023742767943567546869574015309959973251303652901670022190200886998993

Checks:
- baseline_unique_root_certificate: PASS (f(alpha*)=-0.00000038188123858891078605993509590626832958705466104459340498680715982373387433133946 at alpha*=0.000083988370919790336417765762209801272377769104550724158162973234936416827589832004 < 0)
- baseline_alpha_inv_close: PASS (alpha_inv=137.03650146488582236606674817671213126705763898504867906796008564574330158473974 vs paper 137.03650146)
- self_consistent_converged: PASS (converged=True in <= 50 iterations, tol=1.0e-30)
- self_consistent_alpha_inv_close: PASS (alpha_inv=137.03599410158383008148619622913336009409257904171246722475352841304700901323215 vs paper 137.0359941)
- self_consistent_monotone_evidence: PASS (F(Î±) strictly increasing on [0.004, 0.012] (grid=200))
